Description

An abstract implementation of Localization.

An abstract implementation of MessageMap.
ComponentSource
An interface to indicate extending MessageSource with Component message type.
FallingBackLegacyFormatSource
A record that implements FallingBackMessageSource for LegacyFormatSource.

An interface to get the message from two MessageSources.

A record that implements FallingBackMessageSource for MiniMessageSource.

An interface that converting the string to Component using LegacyComponentSerializer.
Loader<T,R>
Represents the Function that do IO related operations, especially loading.

MessageBuilder<M,B extends MessageBuilder<M,B>>
A builder class for building the message.

Represents the Supplier that create a new MessageBuilder.

An interface to hold the messages.
MessageSource<T>
An interface to get the message.
MiniMessageBuilder
A MessageBuilder for MiniMessageSource.
MiniMessageLocalization
A Localization implementation for MiniMessageSource.
MiniMessageSource
An interface that converting the string to Component using MiniMessage.

A utility class for reading/writing properties file or format.
StringMessageMap
An implementation class of MessageMap and StringMessageSource.
StringMessageSource
An interface to indicate extending MessageSource with String message type.
